stimulusHtml: The object of mass m shown above is dropped from rest near Earth’s surface and experiences a resistive force of magnitude kv , where v is the speed of the object and k is a constant. Which of the following expressions can be used to find v as a function of time t ? (Assume that the direction of the gravitational force is positive.)
